title: Churches, that is, appropriate places for Christian vvorship both in, and ever since the Apostles times. A discourse at first more briefly delivered in a colledge chappell, and since enlarged. By Joseph Mede, B.D. and fellow of Christs Colledge in Cambridge.
author: Mede, Joseph, 1586-1638.
publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for John Clark, and are to be sold at his shop under St Peters Church in Cornhill,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
